page_content: The page provides supplementary explanations and information about the building permit process.
The page provides information on how to declare assets or securities for tax purposes.
The page discusses the final stage of the Tour de Suisse cycling event and its impact on traffic in the Canton of Bern.
The page announces the redesign of tax-related websites, focusing on mobile usability and electronic services.
The page discusses new constitutional provisions regarding citizenship requirements in the Canton of Bern.
